Text: The Olympic medal table is a method of sorting the medal placements of countries in the modern-day Olympics and Paralympics.

Triplets:<The Olympic medal table
1:
--------------------
Text: Olympic medal table:  The International Olympic Committee (IOC) does not officially recognize a ranking of participating countries at the Olympic Games.
Triplets:<The International Olympic Committee
3:
--------------------
Text: Olympic medal table:  The convention used by the IOC is to sort by the number of gold medals the athletes from a country have earned.
Triplets:<Olympic medal table
5:
--------------------
Text: Olympic medal table:  If two countries have an equal number of gold, silver, and bronze medals, they are ordered in the table alphabetically by their IOC country code.
Triplets:<Olympic medal table
